means: （尤指地中海沿岸的）三桅小帆船

sentence.Network_en: A "Felucca" is the traditional Nile sailboat, unchanged since the time of the pharaohs.
sentence.Network_cn: Felucca是尼罗河地区的传统帆船，自法老时代起就没有变过。

sentence.Network_en: A lateen - rigged sailboat called a felucca plies the Nile River in fading light near Aswan, Egypt.
sentence.Network_cn: 意译:主标题:帆船航行在尼罗河,阿斯旺, 埃及,1998年.

sentence.Network_en: Felucca sailing boats are usually regarded as a calm and safe method of transport.
sentence.Network_cn: 其实通常情况下,他们遇难时所乘的三桅小帆船都是安全可靠的.

沿著尼罗河岸走，沿途不少人招揽旅客搭小帆船(Felucca)。小帆船是没有机械动力、靠著风力航行在尼罗河的埃及传统帆船。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Italian feluc(c)a, probably from obsolete Spanish faluca, of Arabic origin
